line_1: Sae I gat paper in a blink,
line_2: An, down gaed stumpie in the ink:

line_1: Sae I gat paper in a blink,
line_2: Quoth I, 'Before I sleep a wink,

line_1: Sae I gat paper in a blink,
line_2: 'An' if ye winna mak it clink,

line_1: At slaps the billies halt a blink,
line_2: Wi' faith an' hope, an' love an' drink,
